Name: Matrix Total Results Color Obessessed So Silver Shampoo
Label:
Ingredients from packaging:
Aqua, Water, Eau, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Coco-Betaine, Glycol Distearate, Dimethicone, Cocamide Mipa, Sodium Benzoate, Hexylene Glycol, Parfum, Fragrance, Salicylic Acid, Carbomer, CI 60730, Ext. Violet 2, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid
Directions from packaging:
Wearing suitable gloves, apply to wet hair, lather and rinse well. Repeat if necessary. For maximum benefits, leave second lather on 3-5 minutes. Follow with Total Results Color Obsessed conditioner.\n\nPrecautions: This product contains ingredients which may cause skin irritation on certain individuals and a preliminary test according to accompanying directions should first be made. This product must not be used for dyeing the eyelashes or eyebrows; to do so may cause blindness. Avoid contact with the eyes and skin (other than areas of application). If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. Keep out of reach of children. Do not ingest. Wear disposable gloves when applying. Wash hands thoroughly after use. Do not use on sensitive or irritated scalps. Perform the following skin allergy test 48 hours before each use of this product, as allergies can develop suddenly, even though you or your client has previously used a haircolor product from this brand or another. Skin allergy test: with soap and water, wash an area the size of a quarter in the bend of your/your client's elbow. Pat dry with absorbent cotton. Apply product to test area, using an absorbent cotton-tipped applicator. Let test spot dry. You should not wash, cover or disturb for 48 hours. You should examine test area periodically over the next 48 hours. If you or your client experiences any reactions - such as redness, burning, itching, swelling skin abrasions, eruptions or irritation in or around the test area, you should not use this product or any other haircolor until after consulting a doctor.
Certification: Product's animal testing policies,PETA: Companies That Do Test on Animals

Warnings from packaging:
Flammable. Extremely flammable - Container may explode if heated. Danger: Extremely Flammable: Pressurized Container: May burst or explode if heated. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves or other sources of heat. Protect against exposure to sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 122 degrees F/50 degrees C. Do not use in presence of open flame or sparks. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Do not spray on an open, naked flame or other ignition source. Do not spray on any incandescent lightbulb. Keep out of reach of children. Keep away from heat, sparks, open flames, and other sources of ignition. No smoking. Do not smoke until hair is thoroughly dry. Use and store container in a well-ventilated area. Do not spray near or in the eyes. Do not apply to irritated skin. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling the contents can be harmful or fatal. First-Aid Treatment: In case of eye contact, flush thoroughly with water. If irritation persists consult a physician. Do not use if nozzle is missing or defective.

Warnings from packaging:
First Aid Treatment: Spray in a well-ventilated area, if adverse reaction occurs on skin or scalp, discontinue use and consult a physician. In case of accidental contact with eyes rinse for 15 minutes consult a physician if problem persists. Extremely flammable. Warning: Flammable contents under pressure avoid spraying in eyes. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 50 degrees C (120 degrees F). Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid fire, flame and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Use only as directed, international misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling containers can be harmful or fatal. Keep our of reach of children. Keep away from heat /sparks /open flames /hot surfaces. No smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Pressurized container. Do not piece or burn, even after use. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50 degrees C/122 degrees F.

Label:

Directions from packaging:
Wearing suitable gloves, apply to wet hair, lather and rinse well. Repeat if necessary. For maximum benefits, leave second lather on 3-5 minutes. Follow with Total Results Color Obsessed conditioner.\n\nPrecautions: This product contains ingredients which may cause skin irritation on certain individuals and a preliminary test according to accompanying directions should first be made. This product must not be used for dyeing the eyelashes or eyebrows; to do so may cause blindness. Avoid contact with the eyes and skin (other than areas of application). If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. Keep out of reach of children. Do not ingest. Wear disposable gloves when applying. Wash hands thoroughly after use. Do not use on sensitive or irritated scalps. Perform the following skin allergy test 48 hours before each use of this product, as allergies can develop suddenly, even though you or your client has previously used a haircolor product from this brand or another. Skin allergy test: with soap and water, wash an area the size of a quarter in the bend of your/your client's elbow. Pat dry with absorbent cotton. Apply product to test area, using an absorbent cotton-tipped applicator. Let test spot dry. You should not wash, cover or disturb for 48 hours. You should examine test area periodically over the next 48 hours. If you or your client experiences any reactions - such as redness, burning, itching, swelling skin abrasions, eruptions or irritation in or around the test area, you should not use this product or any other haircolor until after consulting a doctor.
Certification: Product's animal testing policies,PETA: Companies That Do Test on Animals

Warnings from packaging:
Flammable. Extremely flammable - Container may explode if heated. Danger: Extremely Flammable: Pressurized Container: May burst or explode if heated. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves or other sources of heat. Protect against exposure to sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 122 degrees F/50 degrees C. Do not use in presence of open flame or sparks. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Do not spray on an open, naked flame or other ignition source. Do not spray on any incandescent lightbulb. Keep out of reach of children. Keep away from heat, sparks, open flames, and other sources of ignition. No smoking. Do not smoke until hair is thoroughly dry. Use and store container in a well-ventilated area. Do not spray near or in the eyes. Do not apply to irritated skin. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling the contents can be harmful or fatal. First-Aid Treatment: In case of eye contact, flush thoroughly with water. If irritation persists consult a physician. Do not use if nozzle is missing or defective.

Warnings from packaging:
First Aid Treatment: Spray in a well-ventilated area, if adverse reaction occurs on skin or scalp, discontinue use and consult a physician. In case of accidental contact with eyes rinse for 15 minutes consult a physician if problem persists. Extremely flammable. Warning: Flammable contents under pressure avoid spraying in eyes. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 50 degrees C (120 degrees F). Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid fire, flame and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Use only as directed, international misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling containers can be harmful or fatal. Keep our of reach of children. Keep away from heat /sparks /open flames /hot surfaces. No smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Pressurized container. Do not piece or burn, even after use. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50 degrees C/122 degrees F.
Certification: Product's animal testing policies,PETA Cruelty-free Companies

Ingredients from packaging:
Butane, SD Alcohol 40B, Propane, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Cyclomethicone, Fragrance, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenol, Ascorbic Acid, Retinyl Palmitate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract
Warnings from packaging:
Flammable. Contents under pressure. Avoid fire, flame and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Do not puncture or incinerate. Do not store at temperatures above 120 degrees F. Use only as directed. Avoid spraying in eyes or open wounds. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children.

Label:
Ingredients from packaging:
Aqua (Water/Eau), Alcohol Denat., Isobutane, Propane, Dimethylimidazolidinone Rice Starch, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Stearyl Alcohol, Zinc, Lactate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenol, Polyquaternium-7, Behentrimonium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Lauryl Methyl Gluceth-10 Hydroxypropyldimonium Chloride, Sodium Chloride, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum (Fragrance), Butane, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, PEG-12 Allyl Ether

Keep out of reach of children. Extremely flammable.
